enb_long_title: Sixteenth Sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies
sentences: In a closed meeting in the early afternoon, the G-77/CHINA said it was unwilling to negotiate on the current Chairs` text.
Parties gave their views and agreed to give the G-77/China time to coordinate its position.
The meeting was reconvened in the evening and delegates exchanged opinions on the sections of the draft guidelines on national circumstances and national greenhouse gas inventory information.
